rationale: 'major increase' uses 'major' modifying 'increase' (noun), not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Then, if you look at 2015, that was when we saw the major increase in cases in Africa—in Egypt, along the Nile River Valley, in people raising domestic ducks.

rationale: 'major increase' is an intensifier + neutral noun ('increase'), which is coded as Neutral under Q2 rules.
statement_text: Then, if you look at 2015, that was when we saw the major increase in cases in Africa—in Egypt, along the Nile River Valley, in people raising domestic ducks.
